articles.description: Phil McNulty assesses the reasons why England can still win Euro 2024 as they prepare for a quarter-final against Switzerland.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Why England can still win tournament

articles.description: Live text, BBC Radio Wales & BBC Radio Cymru commentary from Wales' first Test against Australia in Sydney, as Warren Gatland's side look to end a seven-game losing streak.
articles.title: Australia v Wales first Test: Live text and commentary

articles.description: "No decision" has been made on the international futures of Cristiano Ronaldo and Pepe, says Portugal boss Roberto Martinez.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo future: 'No decision' made on striker or Pepe's Portugal future

articles.description: Spain hero Mikel Merino says their Euro 2024 quarter-final win over hosts Germany could have been a final - and coach Luis de la Fuente compares his team to a "winning horse".
articles.title: Spain 2-1 Germany: 'Like a Euros final' -  'insatiable' Spain like a 'winning horse'

articles.description: New Zealand edge past England 16-15 in a thrilling opening Test in Dunedin to kickstart Scott Robertson's era as head coach with a win.
articles.title: New Zealand 16-15 England: All Blacks win first Test in Dunedin

articles.description: Andy Murray will continue his Wimbledon farewell when he teams up with Emma Raducanu in the mixed doubles on Saturday.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024: Andy Murray, Emma Raducanu, Harriet Dart and Cameron Norrie play on Saturday

articles.description: Klay Thompson, who won four NBA titles and has been named an All-Star five times, confirms he is leaving the Golden State Warriors.
articles.title: Klay Thompson to leave Golden State Warriors and set for Dallas Mavericks

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz keeps alive his hopes of retaining his Wimbledon title by coming through a five-set thriller against Frances Tiafoe.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 results: Carlos Alcaraz wins five-set thriller against Frances Tiafoe
